name: Be A Farmer In Paruro 4D
description: Enjoy a three-day journey getting to know the real traditional ways of the Cuzco region. You will be amongst locals off the beaten track, getting to know life as it was and continues to this day. You will learn to make the sacred drink of the Incas, bake your own bread, cook traditionally, go to the farm make crops of maize, eat wathia and learn the traditional and medicinal uses of local plants.
